TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. There are now one hundred million pennies on your desk, not enough to console you for getting double ninja'd.

I wish to be independently wealthy.

Granted. You buy everything you like and achieve, everything you want. But thats not what you wanted. You lose faith in the everything and see only the worst of things. You hang yourself.

I wish for a full rep bar.

Granted. It is full of red bars instead, because asking people for rep usually results in negreps instead.

I wish I had a train.

Granted. It's powered by hype, and the tank is almost empty.

I wish for more kirby.

Granted. Kirby now appears with 95% probability per minute on Eve. It will inhale your rocket immediately and unavoidably.

I wish to rule the multiverse.

Granted, but it turns out the inhabitants aren't pleased by your ultimate power. They steal your magical power fire and shoot lasers at you.

I wish I had a magical power fire to replace all of those uranium rods and coal plants.

Granted. The magical power fire only exists for a fraction of a second before disappearing.

I wish I had a powerful computer.

granted, but it cant fit in your house

I wish for a laser

Granted. Upon first use, the batteries explode and destroy it.

I wish that I could go to the moon.

Granted. Your best friend hangs a moon on you, and you're compelled to go to it.

I wish I could taser bad drivers.

Granted, but your first attempt hits the gas tank and explodes. You're jailed for life for murdering a busload of people.

I still wish for chocolate.

Granted. It's beamed up to the K. ACRONYM. enterprise so that spockilogic can eat it.

I wish that pirates had laser guns, including the interweb pirats.

Granted. We all speak pirate and live on the coast in boats and get in lengthy sword fights in bars, because 16th century pirates got laser guns too. Also, Pirates haven't invented KSP or interwebs, so great job.

If only you had remembered to make a wish. Since you wished for nothing, you will be converted to nothing. *focuses an orbital laser on your house, reducing it to dust and gases with you still inside*

I wish I had a winning lottery ticket.

Granted. It's a winning lottery ticket for -$1000 dollars.

I wish all ants in my property would disappear.

Accepted, all your ants disappear and become spiders.

I wish I would get straight A's in school

Granted. All your grades are fAils.

I wish schools focused on educating rather than prepping for standardized tests.

Granted. All your grades are fAils.

I wish schools focused on educating rather than prepping for standardized tests.

granted. They focus on educating through standardized pop quizzes and projects that were unnecessary

i wish that education wasn't competitive (ANYMORE!!)

Granted. Barely anyone can afford smartness.

I wish for corrupt kindness.

Granted. You receive a little bunny, but it has glowing red eyes and purple fur. Your head is eaten.

I wish that I will receive a green health bar.

Granted. The health bar is green from radioluminescence caused by critical plutonium and gives you radiation sickness.

I wish that I wasn't sick.

Granted. You are now dead, and therefore no longer sick.

I wish the potatoes were able to potate into patotoes.

Granted, but potate isn't a word, so the potatoes did nothing.

I wish I wasn't dead. (Kidding! I'm alive. )

You're alive. (Kidding! You're dead! )

I wish I could alter coefficients of friction and masses of objects at will during sporting events.

Granted. You accidentally make the mass of a baseball zero, causing it to move at the speed of light and does this.

I wish that ice cream didn't make you fat.
